statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_agents;
SELECT agent_name, access_level FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_type = 'Human';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM virtual_agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(access_level) AS average_access_level FROM virtual_agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, access_level, DATE_FORMAT(last_interaction,'%Y-%m-%d') AS last_interaction_date FROM virtual_agents ORDER BY last_interaction ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_agents WHERE access_level < 5 ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_type FROM virtual_agents WHERE last_interaction > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_interaction ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_agents FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_type = 'Chatbot';
SELECT AVG(access_level) AS avg_access_level, MAX(last_interaction) AS latest_interaction FROM virtual_agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, access_level FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_type LIKE '%AI%' ORDER BY access_level DESC, agent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, access_level FROM agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM agents WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM queries WHERE query_id = 10;
SELECT query_text FROM queries WHERE response_text IS NULL;
SELECT agent_name, access_level FROM agents WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT query_text, response_text FROM queries WHERE LENGTH(query_text) > 50 ORDER BY query_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM agents JOIN queries ON agents.agent_id = queries.query_id WHERE response_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT agent_name, access_level FROM agents WHERE access_level < 3 OR access_level > 7 ORDER BY agent_id ASC, access_level DESC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM agents WHERE agent_name LIKE 'A%' OR agent_name LIKE '%e' ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM queries WHERE agent_id = 2 ORDER BY query_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_time FROM log_history WHERE log_time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT * FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM agents WHERE agent_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT queries.query_text, queries.query_response, log_history.log_time FROM queries JOIN log_history ON queries.query_id = log_history.query_id;
SELECT agents.agent_name, queries.query_text FROM agents JOIN queries ON agents.agent_id = queries.agent_id WHERE agents.agent_id = 1;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(query_id) AS total_queries FROM queries GROUP BY agent_id HAVING total_queries >= 5 ORDER BY total_queries DESC;
SELECT * FROM VirtualAgents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, email FROM VirtualAgents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, phone_number FROM VirtualAgents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Queries WHERE query_id = 2;
SELECT query_text AS question, response_text AS answer FROM Queries ORDER BY query_id ASC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, email FROM VirtualAgents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT query_text, response_text FROM Queries ORDER BY query_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Automations WHERE automation_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT agent_name, phone_number FROM VirtualAgents WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_text FROM Logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_status='Active';
SELECT agent_name, agent_status FROM virtual_agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(*) AS num_queries FROM virtual_agents JOIN agent_statistics ON virtual_agents.agent_id = agent_statistics.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name;

SELECT agent_name, SUM(queries_processed) AS total_queries FROM virtual_agents JOIN agent_statistics ON virtual_agents.agent_id = agent_statistics.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name ORDER BY total_queries DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_status='Active';
SELECT query_id, query_text, response_text FROM common_queries ORDER BY query_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM agent_logs WHERE agent_id IN (SELECT agent_id FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_status='Inactive');
SELECT agent_id, SUM(queries_processed) AS total_queries_processed FROM agent_statistics GROUP BY agent_id HAVING total_queries_processed > 1000;
